org.keycloak.services.resources.admin

Class AdminRoot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.keycloak.services.resources.admin.AdminRoot

  • @Path(value="/admin")
public class AdminRoot
extends Object
    Root resource for admin console and admin REST API
